title: bitcointry
author: bitcointry
created_time: December 01, 2022, 12:27:50 PMLast edit: April 06, 2023, 09:13:17 AM by bitcointry
content: Bitcointry.com is a mix of CEX and DEX, built on Web3 technology. Users can connect to the app, deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies with Web3 wallets, just like on a regular DEX exchange. It does not require any KYC, email, phone number or any other personal information from the users. In addition, users can create LIMIT, MARKET and STOP LIMIT orders, just like on CEX exchanges, and trade as they wish for which they do not have to pay GAS fees. Bitcointry infrastructure is integrated with the three largest exchanges preventing liquidity issues.Bitcointry supported apps and wallets:💰Metamask💰Trustwallet💰Tronlink💰Coinbase WalletBitcointry exchange also supports deposits and withdrawals from the following networks:💎Ethereum💎BNB Smart Chain💎Arbitrum💎Avax C-Chain💎Tron💎Optimism💎Polygon Chain💎CICchain💎CoreChainWhat makes #Bitcointry unique?A mix of what is best in DEX and CEX❗️🔸No limit for daily withdrawals and transactions 🔸No GAS fees for trades within the exchange🔸LIMIT, MARKET and STOP LIMIT orders 🔸No KYC required for withdrawals and deposits, connect your wallet and start trading IMMEDIATELY! (except for FIAT transactions in Turkish Lira)🔸No liquidity issues🔸In-build staking platform to stake your $BTTY (and other projects in the future)🔸Android and iOS (soon) trading APPs  The headquarters of the company is located in Turkey. Additionally, TRY(FIAT) pair has been activated on Bitcointry cryptocurrency exchange allowing users in Turkey to buy and sell cryptocurrencies directly with Turkish Lira through contracted banks. As per KYC/AML policies, ONLY Turkish users are required to verify their identity in order to deposit and withdraw Turkish Lira. However, there is no such restrictions for any other transactions within the exchange.Bitcointry Exchange and Token Information 🖐 Website:https://bitcointry.com/en🖐 Roadmap:https://bitcointry.com/en/roadmap🖐 Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bitcointrycom🖐 Telegram Group:https://t.me/bitcointryofficial🖐 Telegram Channel:https://t.me/bitcointrychannel🖐 Turkey Group:https://t.me/bitcointryTurkiye🖐 Whitepaper:https://bitcointry.com/Whitepaper.pdf🖐 Mobile app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bitcointry.com🖐 Buy BTTY:https://bitcointry.com/en/exchange/BTTY_USDThttps://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x9cc83d580180f0d37d00e5d86ce868f73b6e3d0a🖐 DexScreener: https://dexscreener.com/ethereum/0x9cc83D580180f0d37d00e5d86ce868f73b6E3D0A🖐 DEXTools:https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x33526cc62580F8543f9A40e1baa1B878b433F36f🖐 CMC:https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcointry-token/🖐 CG:https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bitcointry-token🖐 Binance Price Page:https://www.binance.com/en/price/bitcointry-token🖐 Youtube Channel:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqivCqBUgSbfZffoE0Yz2Yg🖐 Dev's previous projects:https://bitexlive.com/https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/bitexlive/🖐 Dev's  socials:Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/BeydilliHalilLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/halil-beydilli-b34661a8/
